title: Fate & Flux
description: Astaria is ruled by wizards, everyone knows that.  Quinn is a journeyman blacksmith for the Wizard Usorin, until, after a tragic accident, Quinn loses his arm and his livelihood.  When he is befriended by Roland, he learns the secret behind the wizardâ€™s power and is set on a path against a foe who seeks to destroy not only Astaria but magic itself.
author: Patrick   Dugan
